messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Sm and gas turbine ar up, if you not got power gimmie a cool or man up and check your wiring

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Solars, SM and Turbine are AAALLLL up, if there is a power problem it 's wiring, so don't use power as a n excuse to call the shuttle

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Dan ox and the chaplin are to be captured reward a premothian to hos or whatever job you want

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: The cap is dead in the brig, the crew monitoring system says so

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Halaal Harbor Romeo door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
